title: Web Developer
description: This was a part-time job during my third year, and it ended when I was about to start my internship. Here, I developed websites using React.js, Express.js, and Nest.js.

title: Flutter Developer
description: During my internship in cross-platform mobile app development using Flutter, I learned and practiced teamwork, enterprise project management, Clean Code Principles, Git-workflow, time estimation, Trello task management, project documentation, and Flutter app development.
